content: knit flat on 2 needles with regular worsted weight yarn with single pointed knitting needles any knitter with some basic knitting knowledge can knit up a pair don t know how to make increases or think you may have trouble with the spider body and head there are youtube videos showing you exactly how to do it it s time to up your knitting game and make some truly awesome stuff you can read the pattern for free on my website here **how to knit fingerless gloves with spiders free knitting pattern** 1 don t worry about the spiders falling off the spider is worked along with the rest of the fingerless mitt it s guaranteed to never fall off if you want to see the easy to follow youtube playlist you can use this link here **spider gloves - required stitches and row explained** 2 a quick note on sizing like my other owl glove pattern knit flat the sizes are adjusted by changing the size of the knitting needles it gives a better overall look and maintains the proportion of the spider to the glove like all my patterns you are free to sell give away or keep any of the items you make with this pattern for even more of my free to read online patterns you can use this link ** free knitting patterns 3 ** there s a bunch of them there now happy knitting everyone 1 https //kweenbee com/how-to-knit-fingerless-gloves-with-spiders/ 2 https //youtube com/playlist list=plfpwdkpbtko_knsa6xojqkhruvuq_i7to 3 https //kweenbee com/free-knitting-patterns/
